raw_body:
VETHAKAN – HELEN,​ a beloved figure cherished by many,​ peacefully passed away on Feb. 28,​ 2024. She was the devoted wife of the late Arthur Vethakan and the loving mother of the late Rajkumar,​ Rajam,​ Winston and Winicia. She was a mother-in-law to Manjula,​ Jerome,​ Rukshana and Derrick. Helen’s influence extended beyond her immediate family,​ as she was an active part of her grandchildren’s lives during their formative years. She was loved by Prashan,​ Jeggan,​ Rajiv,​ Rumesh,​ Divya,​ Ashwini,​ Jonathan,​ Maneka,​ Johanan and Radesh,​ along with their spouses Pooja,​ Sumyutha,​ Karen,​ Anisha,​ Rehan,​ Shevin and Nicole. Helen was also blessed with three great-grandchildren Ella,​ Jiya and Rhea. Family and friends are invited to pay their respects as Helen’s remains will be at the A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 9 a.m. onwards on Saturday,​ March 2nd. A funeral service will be held at 3 p.m. on the same day,​ followed by her Cremation at 4 p.m. at the Old Crematorium in Kanatte,​ Borella. May she rest in eternal peace.
